data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: Sadly, Jane's cat died this Tuesday. The ____ had ____ suffering ____ some ____, ____ after Jane ceased ____ he ____ passed ____. I ____ like ____ drop ____ soon ____ comfort ____ if I have ____. A sympathetic friend is always appreciated during these times.
data.partBlankContent: Sadly, Jane's cat died this Tuesday. The c__ had be__ suffering f__ some ti__, a__ after Jane ceased medic_____ he qui____ passed aw__. I wo___ like t_ drop b_ soon t_ comfort h__ if I have ti__. A sympathetic friend is always appreciated during these times.
data.fullContent: Sadly, Jane's cat died this Tuesday. The cat had been suffering for some time, and after Jane ceased medication he quickly passed away. I would like to drop by soon to comfort her if I have time. A sympathetic friend is always appreciated during these times.
data.answer: 不幸的是，Jane的猫星期二死了。这只猫已经遭受了一段时间的痛苦，Jane停止用药后，它很快就去世了。如果有时间，我想马上去安慰她。在这些时候，一个富有同情心的朋友总是让人感激的。
